ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and rescue us, by Your mercy, from this kafir people!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And deliver us by Your grace from a people who do not believe."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and deliver us, through Your mercy, from the unbelievers.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Lord, save us, through Your mercy, from the disbelieving people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And with Your mercy, rescue us from the disbelievers.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And save us by Your mercy from the disbelieving folk."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And do Thou deliver us by Thy mercy from the unbelieving people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and deliver us by Thy mercy from the people of the unbelievers.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And, of Thy mercy, save us from the folk that disbelieve.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And deliver us by Your mercy from the people who deny the truth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And deliver us in Thine mercy from the disbelieving people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and deliver us by Your mercy from the faithless lot.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And deliver us by Thy Mercy from those who reject (Thee)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And save us by Your Mercy from the disbelieving folk."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Save us, through Your Mercy, from the unbelieving nation'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “And deliver us, by Your mercy, from the disbelieving people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And save us by Your mercy from the disbelieving people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:86] and deliver us by Your mercy from the unbelieving folk’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And, of Thy mercy, save us from the folk that disbelieve) from Pharaoh and his folk.
